effect.en: Put a Basic Pokémon from your discard pile onto your Bench.
effect.fr: Placez un Pokémon de base de votre pile de défausse sur votre Banc.
effect.es: Pon 1 Pokémon Básico de tu pila de descartes en tu Banca.
effect.it: Prendi un Pokémon Base dalla tua pila degli scarti e mettilo in panchina.
effect.pt: Coloque 1 Pokémon Básico da sua pilha de descarte no seu Banco.
effect.de: Lege 1 Basis-Pokémon aus deinem Ablagestapel auf deine Bank.

description.en: After a lost child perished in the forest, their spirit possessed a tree stump, causing the spirit's rebirth as this Pokémon.
